titles.title: Restricting Credit Checks for Employment Decisions Act
Restricting Credit Checks for Employment Decisions Act
To amend the Fair Credit Reporting Act to ban the use of credit information for most employment decisions, and for other purposes.

bill.summary:
Restricting Credit Checks for Employment Decisions Act
This bill generally prohibits a consumer reporting agency from providing a consumer's credit information for employment purposes, unless otherwise required by law or for a national security investigation.
